GisGeometryFactoryAbstract Class Reference

#include <GeometryFactoryAbstract.h>

Inherits GisIDisposable.

Inherited by GisAgfGeometryFactory.

Inheritance diagram for GisGeometryFactoryAbstract:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisGeometryFactoryAbstract class is a factory (abstract, non-pure) for Geometry objects and Geometry helper objects.

Definition at line 31 of file GeometryFactoryAbstract.h.
